Definition.WordDefinition: Roper, NC (town, FIPS 57740) Location: 35.87742 N, 76.61709 W Population (1990): 669 (260 housing units) Area: 2.2 sq km (land), 0.0 sq km (water) Zip code(s): 27970

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Roper \Rop"er\, n. 1. A maker of ropes. --P. Plowman. [1913 Webster]
2. One who ropes goods; a packer. [1913 Webster]
3. One fit to be hanged. [Old Slang] --Douce. [1913 Webster]

roper n 1: a decoy who lures customers into a gambling establishment (especially one with a fixed game) 2: a cowboy who uses a lasso to rope cattle or horses 3: a craftsman who makes ropes [syn: {ropemaker}, {rope-maker}]
